name: RA_CDI_REVIEW
description: A table to hold the recommendations made from Risk Adjustment CDI Reviews.

columns.name: CODING_RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the coding record record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: RA_CDI_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The type of recommendation being made - component or diagnosis.

columns.name: RA_CDI_COMP_TEMPLATE_VERSION_C_NAME
columns.description: The version of the component that a recommendation is being added to. One risk adjustment model may have multiple versions, as the sets of diagnoses related to a component may be changed over time by a payer or organization.

columns.name: RA_CDI_DX_ID
columns.description: The diagnosis that is being recommended.

columns.name: RA_CDI_DX_EDG_CODE_SET_C_NAME
columns.description: The code set of the diagnosis being recommended in I COD 803.

columns.name: RA_CDI_RECOM_ACTION_C_NAME
columns.description: The recommendation on the component or diagnosis.

columns.name: RA_CDI_REVIEWED_YN
columns.description: If this recommendation has been acted on by a provider

columns.name: RA_CDI_REC_CMT
columns.description: The reviewer's comment associated with their recommendation.

columns.name: RA_CDI_REC_NEW_YN
columns.description: If the diagnosis or component being recommended or commented on is manually added by a user in this review.

columns.name: REC_SRC_CODING_RECORD_CSN_ID
columns.description: The CSN of the review where this diagnosis or component recommendation was first added.
